website_summaries.verdict: Self-evaporative air conditioner capable of cooling a room up to 200 square feet.
pros: High-visibility LED display and electronic controls
Can also be operated via remote control
Auto-restart feature saves settings upon restart in case of a power outage
Loudness at low power is only 50 decibels
Flexible exhaust hose and window venting kit included
cons: A few didn't think it cooled their space as well as they expected

customer_reviews.title: Air output was great, easy to setup for vent to the outside ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son's dorm room. Air output was great, easy to setup for vent to the outside window. Problem was that the drip pan filled up too quickly, at least 2 gallons of water a day had to be dumped. I bought this unit because I thought it would not drip since the description indicated self-evaporating unit. Probably my misunderstanding, but would not recommend this unit if you do not want to deal with the drip pan.
customer_reviews.author: TammyT

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Perfect size for my bedroom. Perfect amount of white noise to drawn out the other Condo neighbors! No more sleepless Summer nights for me!:)
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect in my semi truck have it running off a Honda generator eu2200i you have to run the generator with the eco- Off turn on the air-conditioner Let itsit for 5 to 10 minutes then you can kick it back on eco and it runs for 6-7 hrs
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work at all.
customer_reviews.text: 0 stars if possible. Bought it for use in a barely 50 square foot camper and it can’t even cool that tiny of a space. Never worked, even brand new out of the box. We even went through all the trouble shooting (my husband can fix about anything) and it still won’t cool the space.
customer_reviews.author: kms10

customer_reviews.title: Due to the heat wave we needed the booths to stay cool when staffed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a few of our guard booths for work. Due to the heat wave we needed the booths to stay cool when staffed...it worked just fine for this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Agnes Tootoo

customer_reviews.title: works well, but noisy
customer_reviews.text: It works well for my bedroom. I only wish that it was quieter. I can't run it and sleep.
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQ

customer_reviews.title: Great product, designed to keep a room cool
customer_reviews.text: Great product, designed to keep a room cool. Works great, blows cold, 6000 btu so if ur expecting to lower the temp to 50-60 degree u are out of luck, but works great for temps down to 62. Maintenance free and will fit almost any size window, to about 5 ft. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: dose not cool down a 7 x 13 ft room. I am returning it
customer_reviews.author: seeta zapata

customer_reviews.title: I installed this in a small room, 9x12 feet ...
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in a small room, 9x12 feet. Even with the thermostat set to 65, the temperature in the room would never go below 74. And, yes, the exhaust hose was well sealed in the window.
customer_reviews.author: icetea

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product. The unit blows only moderately cool air
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. The unit blows only moderately cool air, not the cold air expected from an A/C. Also, it doesn't shut down if room temperature drops below the desired temperature
customer_reviews.author: shaun mulreed

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a renter who constantly said the room he rents is hot. Installation took about an hour and once it was turned on it was like heaven in there. His room is 11x11 and this AC can easily keep it at 64 degrees. He is happy which means I'm happy. Noise level is about what you would expect from a table fan. Have had no condensation issues or other problems.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Collins

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: Better than nothing. It got me through a heat wave in a room that I couldn't put a window unit in, which is a good thing. BUT it just doesn't give the same quality of cool that a window unit does. The air feels more humid, less cool, very heavy. For next summer, I will have to think of another option because I won't use this for another year. EDIT: I didn't make it through the whole heat wave. I returned it and slept in another room with a window unit. I don't know if it is the floor unit technology or just this brand, but the air quality feels heavy and not cool.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: It works for chicago Summers
customer_reviews.text: Not super cold, but it got me through the chicago summer, so I'm a fan. Pun intended.
customer_reviews.author: E. Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Great item, 2 years and works as good as day1
customer_reviews.text: Update: 2 years and still works as good, energy use is low you don't really hear the compressor going on and off that much, I can sleep with it on all night when needed. _______________________ This one works well for my area it gets hot but not scorching hot, 80's-90's , it has low AMP perfect for old buildings or apartments with old electrical wiring and won't pop up your breakers Don't try and complain if you try to use it in a big room or with a 120F weather outside, get real.
customer_reviews.author: SILVIA S.

product_meta.title: Keystone KSTAP06E 115V Portable Air Conditioner with "Follow Me" Remote Control for Rooms up to 50-Sq. Ft.
product_meta.description:
Keystone's portable air conditioner with "Follow Me" remote control features 3 modes to keep you comfortable - cool, fan and dry. Designed for a room up to 50 square feet, features include manual front louvers for air direction, electronic controls with LED display and a temperature sensing remote control. Quiet operation (50 dBA on low) helps you get a good night's sleep. Omni-directional casters roll the unit easily from room to room wherever you need relief. Plus, this self-evaporative unit includes a flexible exhaust hose and window venting kit for quick and easy setup. 

*See Qualifier Statement
feature_bullets: 6, 000 BTU portable air conditioner with Self-evaporative system
Designed for a room up to 200 sq. Ft
Electronic controls with LED display and remote control
Auto-restart saves your settings when power is restored to the Unit after a power outage
QUIET operation for a good night's sleep (50 dba on low)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars23 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 1-year parts and labor, plus additional 4 years for sealed system.
specifications.Included Components: Air conditioner, remote control, 2 AAA batteries, flexible exhaust hose, window venting kit, manual, warranty
